targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (9)
    and a.id_estatus in (1,2)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404) 
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404) 
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and a.verificado is null 
and (a.feedback < 3 or a.feedback is null)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404) 
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
                                           FROM gestion.caso a
                                           inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                           where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
                                           and b.principal is true
                                           and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404) 
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404) 
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (371) 
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6) 
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT round(avg(a.feedback))::Text "Average" 
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			where  b.id_resolutorio in (371)
			and a.feedback is not null

-- Porcentaje de Eficiencia Casos Cerrados
SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (-- Casos Recibidos
                                            SELECT count(a.id)
                                            FROM gestion.caso a
                                            inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                            where b.id_resolutorio in (371) 
                                            and b.principal is true
                                            and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) )::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (371) 
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6) 
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

			FROM gestion.caso a

			where  b.id_resolutorio in (404)
			and a.feedback is not null

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
                                           FROM gestion.caso a
                                           inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                           where b.id_resolutorio in (404)
                                           and b.principal is true
                                           and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8))::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
where b.id_resolutorio in (404)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	 where  a.id_sub_categoria in (9) and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
    group by estado
    order by total desc
    Limit 10;

panels.title: ESTADOS CON MAYOR NUMERO DE CASOS EN EL SISTEMA

targets.rawSql:
select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	 where  a.id_sub_categoria in (9) and a.id_estatus in (6)
    group by estado
    order by total desc
    Limit 10;

panels.title: ESTADOS CON MAYOR NUMERO DE CASOS ATENDIDO

targets.rawSql:
-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

select  to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YYYY') as fecham, to_char(a.fecha, 'YYYY-mm-dd') as fechao,
	count(a.fecha) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	where  a.fecha > CAST(now()::timestamp AS DATE) - CAST('15 days' AS INTERVAL)  
	and a.id_sub_categoria in (9) 
	and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
        group by fecham, fechao
        order by fechao

panels.title: HISTÓRICO DE CASOS RECIBIDO EN EL SISTEMA DESDE LA VENAPP (ÚLTIMOS DÍAS)

targets.rawSql:
SET CLIENT_ENCODING TO 'UTF8';
SELECT a.nombre::Text "CANTV",
    	e.cedula::Text "CEDULA",
    	e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
    	e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO",
    	e.telefono_alt::Text "TELEFONO ALT",
    	b.nombre::Text "ESTADO",
    	c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO",
    	d.nombre::Text "PARROQ",
    	a.titulo::Text "ASUNTO", 
    	a.telefono_suscrip::Text "TELEF./NUMERO SUSCRIP",
    	a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
	  	f.name::Text "CATEGORIA",
	  	g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",
	  	a.fecha::Text "FECHA CREACION",
	  	a.fecha_registro::Text "FECHA STATUS", 
	  	case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
		i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
		k.nombre::Text "RESPONSABLE"
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            left join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            left JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
      where  j.id_resolutorio in (371)
      and j.principal is true
      and i.nombre in ($estatuscasos)
      and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)
      and $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro)

SET CLIENT_ENCODING TO 'UTF8';
SELECT a.nombre::Text "MOVILNET",
    	e.cedula::Text "CEDULA",
    	e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
    	e.telefono_alt::Text "TELEFONO ALT",
    	e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO",
    	b.nombre::Text "ESTADO",
    	c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO",
    	d.nombre::Text "PARROQ",
    	a.titulo::Text "ASUNTO",
    	a.telefono_suscrip::Text "TELEF./NUMERO SUSCRIP",
    	a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
	  	f.name::Text "CATEGORIA",
	  	g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",
	  	a.fecha::Text "FECHA CREACION",
	  	a.fecha_registro::Text "FECHA STATUS", 
	  	case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
		i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
		k.nombre::Text "RESPONSABLE"
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            left join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            left JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
      where  j.id_resolutorio in (374)
      and j.principal is true
      and i.nombre in ($estatuscasos)
      and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)
      and $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro)

SET CLIENT_ENCODING TO 'UTF8';
SELECT a.nombre::Text "CONATEL",
    	e.cedula::Text "CEDULA",
    	e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
    	e.telefono_alt::Text "TELEFONO ALT",
    	e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO",
    	b.nombre::Text "ESTADO",
    	c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO",
    	d.nombre::Text "PARROQ",
    	a.titulo::Text "ASUNTO",
    	a.telefono_suscrip::Text "TELEF./NUMERO SUSCRIP",
    	a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
	  	f.name::Text "CATEGORIA",
	  	g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",
	  	a.fecha::Text "FECHA CREACION",
	  	a.fecha_registro::Text "FECHA STATUS", 
	  	case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
		i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
		k.nombre::Text "RESPONSABLE"
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            left join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            left JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
      where  j.id_resolutorio in (404)
      and j.principal is true
      and i.nombre in ($estatuscasos)
      and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)
      and $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro)

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS  DE LA BASE DE DATOS

targets.rawSql:
select b.nombre::Text "ESTADOS CANTV",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "RECIBIDO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ASIGNADO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (4,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "EN PROCESO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND ((a.feedback < 2 and a.verificado is null) or (a.feedback is null and a.verificado is null)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "POR CONFIRMAR",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ATENDIDO", --, count(a.id) as "TOTAL"
trunc(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (4) and  e.id_resolutorio in (563) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/count(*)::decimal,2) AS "% EFECTIVIDAD %"
from gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.resolutorio z on z.id =  e.id_resolutorio
inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
where  a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)
and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (4) 
and b.id < 25 and  e.id_resolutorio in (371)
and e.principal is true
group by b.nombre
HAVING count(*) > 1
order by "% EFECTIVIDAD %" desc

select b.nombre::Text "ESTADOS MOVILNET",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "RECIBIDO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ASIGNADO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (4,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "EN PROCESO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND ((a.feedback < 2 and a.verificado is null) or (a.feedback is null and a.verificado is null)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "POR CONFIRMAR",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ATENDIDO", --, count(a.id) as "TOTAL"
trunc(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (4) and  e.id_resolutorio in (566) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/count(*)::decimal,2) AS "% EFECTIVIDAD %"
from gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.resolutorio z on z.id =  e.id_resolutorio
inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
where  a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)
and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (4) 
and b.id < 25 and  e.id_resolutorio in (374)
and e.principal is true --and z.nombre in ($gobernaciones)
group by b.nombre
HAVING count(*) > 1
order by "% EFECTIVIDAD %" desc

select b.nombre::Text "ESTADOS CONATEL",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "RECIBIDO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ASIGNADO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (4,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "EN PROCESO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND ((a.feedback < 2 and a.verificado is null) or (a.feedback is null and a.verificado is null)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "POR CONFIRMAR",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ATENDIDO", --, count(a.id) as "TOTAL"
trunc(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (4) and  e.id_resolutorio in (597) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/count(*)::decimal,2) AS "% EFECTIVIDAD %"
from gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.resolutorio z on z.id =  e.id_resolutorio
inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
where  a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)
and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (4) 
and b.id < 25 and  e.id_resolutorio in (404)
and e.principal is true --and z.nombre in ($gobernaciones)
group by b.nombre
HAVING count(*) > 1
order by "% EFECTIVIDAD %" desc

list.definition: SELECT nombre FROM gestion.estatus where id in (3,4,6,8)
list.label: Estatus de los Casos
list.name: estatuscasos
list.query: SELECT nombre FROM gestion.estatus where id in (3,4,6,8)
